LanguageData.NHCP.HeaderLabel_RestartRequired: Restart game for any changes to take effect.
LanguageData.NHCP.TabSubLabel_FuelDescription: Enabled things will be used as fuel.
LanguageData.NHCP.TabSubLabel_CommonalityDescription:
Commonality values define how likely stuff is to generate from a material.
Min: 0, Max: 10
0 = never generates; 10 does not mean 100%-it's relative to all other materials.
Reference: Wood = 1.0; Gold = 0.02, so be careful with high values.
LanguageData.NHCP.CheckboxSubLabel_Logging: Logs some information on game start.\nYou probably don't want it on.
LanguageData.NHCP.CheckboxSubLabel_HayNeedsCooling: If off, removes the need to refrigerate base game Hay or New Harvest hay.\nIt will instead just deteriorate if outdoors.
LanguageData.NHCP.CheckboxSubLabel_AddToCategory: Attempts to place New Harvest {0} into a '{1}' category, if one can be found.\nDefault: OFF
LanguageData.NHCP.CheckboxSubLabel_MergeCategory: (EXPERIMENTAL) Creates a '{0}' category and attempts to merge all '{1}' categories into the created category.\nThe button below will become active after restarting the game, and allow for moving things into desired categories.\nDefault: OFF
LanguageData.NHCP.CheckboxSubLabel_ResourceReadout: Shows the category as a primary resource on the resource readout.
LanguageData.NHCP.CheckboxLabel_MoveDrinksToVBECatego: Move Medicinal Drinks to VBE Category
LanguageData.NHCP.CheckboxSubLabel_MoveDrinksToVBECat: Move New Harvest medicinal drinks to VBE's non-alcoholic category.
LanguageData.NHCP.CheckboxLabel_AddAquaticReedsToBiom: Add New Harvest Reeds To Biomes
LanguageData.NHCP.CheckboxSubLabel_AddAquaticReedsToB: Adds aquatic New Harvest reeds to biomes containing Odyssey reeds at 25% their frequency.
LanguageData.NHCP.CheckboxSubLabel_AddMoreWoodFloors: Add more floors using New Harvest wood.
LanguageData.NHCP.CheckboxLabel_NewHarvestNonWoodFloo: New Harvest Non-Wood Floors To Dropdown:
LanguageData.NHCP.CheckboxSubLabel_NewHarvestNonWoodF: Group New Harvest non-wood floors (alfalfa, clover, timothy, cork, rattan, reed, rubber) in a single dropdown.
LanguageData.NHCP.CheckboxLabel_NewHarvestWoodFloorsT: New Harvest Wood Floors To Dropdowns:
LanguageData.NHCP.CheckboxSubLabel_NewHarvestWoodFloo: Group New Harvest wood floors (cedar, ebony, mahogany, rosewood) into dropdowns.
LanguageData.NHCP.CheckboxSubLabel_BaseWoodFloorsToDr: Group base wood floors in a dropdown.
LanguageData.NHCP.CheckboxSubLabel_ModWoodFloorsToDro: Group mod-added wood floors in dropdowns.
LanguageData.NHCP.CheckboxSubLabel_AddWoodDryads: Add new dryad types to make cedar, ebony, mahogany or rosewood logs.
LanguageData.NHCP.CheckboxSubLabel_AddHayConversionRe: Adds a Crafting Spot recipe to convert 50 New Harvest hay into base game hay.
LanguageData.NHCP.CheckboxSubLabel_AddWoodConversionR: Adds a Stonecutter's Table recipe to convert 50 New Harvest wood into base game wood.
LanguageData.NHCP.CheckboxSubLabel_UseVanillaLogGraph: Makes New Harvest Logs use colored vanilla log textures.
LanguageData.NHCP.SectionLabel_FallColorTreesSectionS: Choose trees that will display fall colors.\nDefault: ALL
LanguageData.NHCP.SectionLabel_MaterialColorsSectionS:
Choose RGB (0-255) color values for materials.
Keep in mind that most things are drawn with no tint in mind (255,255,255).
Thing is the actual item, like a wood log. Stuff is made out of the item, like a wall.
Press the 'Apply' button to set any changes.
Cannot apply separately, choose either one or both.
